column4: QUESTION: every time I log on to pigin I get "NickServ: (notice) The nickname [yahooshua] is not registered"
you have to register your nickname, /msg nickserv register <your-password>
then you have to register it when you log in again: /msg nickserv identify <your-password>
you have to create a password when you run that commantd
the first command I showed you
send it in your irc window
yes. please read your irc chat manual
yes sir. thank you very much
